metadata.title: CVE-2018-25008 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the standard library in Rust before 1.29.0, there is weaksynchronization in the Arc::get_mut method. This synchronization issue canbe lead to memory safety issues through race conditions.

criterions.comment: rustc: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
